import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DrawHistory } from '../models/DrawHistory'; import { Lottery } from '../services/lottery.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-draw-history', templateUrl: './draw-history.component.html' }) export class DrawHistoryComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public lottery: Lottery) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.lottery.loadDrawHistory() .subscribe(); } }
